titleInfo.title: Le Caire. Int, de la Mosquée Mehémet Ali.

mods.abstract: Interior, mosque of Mohammed Ali at Cairo (A.D. 1857); marble adorned minbar of mosque, built by Mohammed Ali Pasha in memory of his son, tucked away in barrel vaulted corner, right ceiling; numerous glass lanterns and semi-circular bars hang from cupolas, center and left ceiling; "Edit. Schroeder & Cie Zurich. 5154. Le Caire . Int. de la Mosquee Mehemet Ali." in white along bottom print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
